if(QT_VERSION_MAJOR EQUAL 6)
    if(QT_VERSION_MINOR EQUAL 6)
        set_property(TARGET quazip PROPERTY INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include/qt6.6")
    else()
        set_property(TARGET quazip PROPERTY INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include/qt6")
    endif()
else()
    set_property(TARGET quazip PROPERTY INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include/qt5")
endif()

if(QT_VERSION_MAJOR EQUAL 6)
    if(QT_VERSION_MINOR EQUAL 6)
        set_property(TARGET quazip PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/libquazip1-qt6.1.0.0.dylib")
    else()
        set_property(TARGET quazip PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/libquazip1-qt6.1.4.0.dylib")
    endif()
else()
    set_property(TARGET quazip PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/libquazip1-qt5.1.0.0.dylib")
endif()
